scripts.watch: yarn run concurrently 'yarn run watch-css' 'yarn run watch-js'
scripts.build: yarn run build-css && yarn run build-js
scripts.watch-css: yarn run chokidar 'assets/sass/**/*.scss' -c "yarn run --silent node-sass assets/sass/styles.scss | yarn run postcss --config assets/config --output ${CSS_BUNDLE}"
scripts.build-css: yarn run --silent node-sass assets/sass/styles.scss | yarn run postcss --config assets/config --output ${CSS_BUNDLE} --no-map
